mapper.sql: a.agent_id AS "agentId", a.login AS "login.id", a.agent_dgr AS "agentDgr", a.fath_agent_id AS "fathAgentId", a.first_agent_id AS "firstAgentId", a.agent_name AS "agentName", a.legal_name AS "legalName", a.legal_identity_no AS "legalIdentityNo", a.lic_no AS "licNo", a.tax_no AS "taxNo", a.address AS "address", a.tel AS "tel", a.moblie_no AS "moblieNo", a.email AS "email", a.froz_state AS "frozState", a.margin AS "margin", a.contract_str_date AS "contractStrDate", a.contract_end_date AS "contractEndDate", a.age_status AS "ageStatus", a.remark AS "remark", a.tech_contact AS "techContact", a.tech_tel_no AS "techTelNo", a.tech_email AS "techEmail", a.tech_mobno AS "techMobno", a.city AS "city.id", a.province AS "province.id", a.biz_contact AS "bizContact", a.biz_mobno AS "bizMobno", a.serv_contact AS "servContact", a.serv_mobno AS "servMobno", a.oem_state AS "oemState", a.settle_type AS "settleType", a.bank_pay_acno AS "bankPayAcno", a.bank_pay_usernm AS "bankPayUsernm", a.bank_code AS "bankCode", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.profit_ratio AS "profitRatio", a.oem_pic_id AS "oemPic", a.opening_license_pic_id AS "openingLicensePic", a.business_license_pic_id AS "businessLicensePic", a.legal_identity_pic_id AS "legalIdentityPic", a.tax_no_pic_id AS "taxNoPic", a.agent_type AS "agentType", a25.name AS "city.name", a26.name AS "province.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_area a25 ON a25.id = a.city LEFT JOIN sys_area a26 ON a26.id = a.province
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tb_agent_inf a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_agent_inf( agent_id, agent_name, legal_name, legal_identity_no, lic_no, tax_no, address, tel, moblie_no, email, froz_state, margin, contract_str_date, contract_end_date, age_status, remark, tech_contact, tech_tel_no, tech_email, tech_mobno, city, province, biz_contact, biz_mobno, serv_contact, serv_mobno, oem_state, settle_type, bank_pay_acno, bank_pay_usernm, bank_code, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, profit_ratio, oem_pic_id, opening_license_pic_id, business_license_pic_id, legal_identity_pic_id, tax_no_pic_id ) VALUES ( #{agentId}, #{agentName}, #{legalName}, #{legalIdentityNo}, #{licNo}, #{taxNo}, #{address}, #{tel}, #{moblieNo}, #{email}, #{frozState}, #{margin}, #{contractStrDate}, #{contractEndDate}, #{ageStatus}, #{remark}, #{techContact}, #{techTelNo}, #{techEmail}, #{techMobno}, #{city.id}, #{province.id}, #{bizContact}, #{bizMobno}, #{servContact}, #{servMobno}, #{oemState}, #{settleType}, #{bankPayAcno}, #{bankPayUsernm}, #{bankCode}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{profitRatio}, #{oemPic}, #{openingLicensePic}, #{businessLicensePic}, #{legalIdentityPic}, #{taxNoPic} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_agent_inf SET agent_name = #{agentName}, legal_name = #{legalName}, legal_identity_no = #{legalIdentityNo}, lic_no = #{licNo}, tax_no = #{taxNo}, address = #{address}, tel = #{tel}, moblie_no = #{moblieNo}, email = #{email}, froz_state = #{frozState}, margin = #{margin}, contract_str_date = #{contractStrDate}, contract_end_date = #{contractEndDate}, age_status = #{ageStatus}, remark = #{remark}, tech_contact = #{techContact}, tech_tel_no = #{techTelNo}, tech_email = #{techEmail}, tech_mobno = #{techMobno}, city = #{city.id}, province = #{province.id}, biz_contact = #{bizContact}, biz_mobno = #{bizMobno}, serv_contact = #{servContact}, serv_mobno = #{servMobno}, oem_state = #{oemState}, settle_type = #{settleType}, bank_pay_acno = #{bankPayAcno}, bank_pay_usernm = #{bankPayUsernm}, bank_code = #{bankCode}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, profit_ratio = #{profitRatio}, oem_pic_id = #{oemPic}, opening_license_pic_id = #{openingLicensePic}, business_license_pic_id = #{businessLicensePic}, legal_identity_pic_id = #{legalIdentityPic}, tax_no_pic_id = #{taxNoPic} WHERE id = #{id}
